case.title: Indian Woman Looking F Indian White Gentellignt To Be Her Best Friend - 45 (Manhattan/Queens)
case.text: Hi i'm a Weat Indian woman from the Caribbean 5'3 135 . What i,m looking for an Indian or White intellignt gentleman with a good since of humor.To be my best friend and maybe a LTR Some one between the age of (40&50)and easy to get along with. Please reply with a picture and little about you . Thank you.
